title: Big Clash at the Etihad
summary: Man City look unstoppable, but Arsenal's defense is the best in the league. I think this ends in a draw.

title: Who stops Salah?
summary: Liverpool's attack is on fire. If they win this weekend, they go top of the table.

title: Saka's Masterclass
summary: Saka continues to carry the Gunners. His stats this season are proving he is the best winger in the PL.
